sentences.en: Bales of cotton were piled up in the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 大捆大捆的棉花堆积在仓库里。

sentences.en: Each warehouse reports back to the retailer which portion (if any) of the customer order it was able to fulfil.
sentences.cn: 每个仓库把它能完成客户定单的哪个部分（如果有）的报告返回给零售商。

sentences.en: He has transferred from the warehouse to the accounts office.
sentences.cn: 他已从仓库调到会计室工作.

sentences.en: How much will you have to pay the warehouse for storage?
sentences.cn: 你得付多少仓库保管费?

sentences.en: I can spend the whole day undisturbed at the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 我可以一整天都呆在仓库里而不受打扰。

sentences.en: I stored up the old furniture in the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 我把旧家具存放在了仓库里。

sentences.en: Once the ventilator shaft became blocked, the warehouse quickly filled with fumes.
sentences.cn: 通风管一旦堵塞, 仓库很快就充满了烟雾.

sentences.en: Somebody set the warehouse aflame.
sentences.cn: 有人放火烧仓库.

sentences.en: The building opposite us is the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 我们对面的那个建筑是仓库。

sentences.en: The Confectionery Warehouse is a chocoholic's dream.
sentences.cn: 糖果仓库是巧克力爱好者的梦幻之乡。

sentences.en: The goods have been sitting in a warehouse for months because a strike has prevented distribution.
sentences.cn: 因为罢工无法发货，货物已经堆在仓库里好几个月了。

sentences.en: The goods overflowed the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 货仓里装满了货物.

sentences.en: The insurance company will take warehouse stocks or treasury bonds as surety.
sentences.cn: 该保险公司将接受仓库库存货物或长期国库券作为担保。

sentences.en: The large warehouse backs on to the river.
sentences.cn: 这大货栈背朝江河。

sentences.en: The trucks waited at the warehouse to pick up their loads.
sentences.cn: 货车在仓库等着装载货物。

sentences.en: The work space is a bare and cavernous warehouse.
sentences.cn: 工作场地是个空荡荡的大仓库。

sentences.en: They leased the building as a warehouse.
sentences.cn: 他们租用这栋大楼作仓库.

sentences.en: This option allows organizations to pay only for the volume of compressed user data they manage in their warehouse.
sentences.cn: 该定价方式允许组织只为他们在其仓库中管理的压缩的用户数据量进行付费。

sentences.en: Thousands of crates compacted in a warehouse.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的板条箱堆放在仓库里.

sentences.en: Tomorrow without fail he would be at the old riverside warehouse.
sentences.cn: 明天他一定会在河边的旧仓库里。

sentences.en: Warehouse clubs allow members to buy goods at wholesale prices.
sentences.cn: 仓储式会员店允许会员以批发价购买商品。

sentences.en: We freighted the goods to the warehouse by truck.
sentences.cn: 我们用卡车把货物运到仓库.

words.tran_cn: 储仓；（商业银行所提供的）周转性短期贷款
把…存入仓库；使落栈（warehouse的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 仓库管理，仓储管理；仓库治理

trans.tran_en: a large building for storing large quantities of goods

trans.tran_cn: 储入仓库；以他人名义购进（股票）
